BitField.Name: reg005_b0
BitField.Description: SPI write to ADC A path

BitField.Name: reg005_b1
BitField.Description: SPI write to ADC B path

BitField.Name: reg008_b1_b0
reg008_b3_b2

Option.Description: 1= 204B core is powered down except for PLL during standby

Register.Name: reg009
Register.Notes: DCS enabled if clock divider enabled

BitField.Name: reg00B_b2_b0
BitField.Description: Clock divider ratio of the divide by 1 to divide by 8 divider circuit to generate the encode clock
BitField.Notes: Using a CLKDIV_DIVIDE_RATIO > 0 (Divide Ratio > 1) causes the DCS to be automatically enabled.

BitField.Name: reg00B_b5_b3
BitField.Description: Clock divider phase output of the internal divide by 1 to divide by 8 divider circuit, clock cycles are relative to the input clock to this block
BitField.Notes: Note that the RF clock divider phase is not selectable.

Option.Description: 1000 = user test mode (use with Register 0x0D, Bit[7] and user pattern 1, 2, 3, 4)

BitField.Name: reg00D_b4
BitField.Description: Short psuedo random number generator reset

BitField.Name: reg00D_b5
BitField.Description: Long psuedo random number generator reset

Option.Description: 10 = single pattern (user pattern 1, 2, 3, 4, then all zeros)

BitField.Name: reg010_b5_b0
BitField.Description: Offset adjust in LSBs from +31 to -32 (twos complement format)

BitField.Name: reg014_b1_b0
BitField.Description: Digital datapath output data format select (DFS) (local)

BitField.Name: reg014_b7_b5
BitField.Description: JTX CS bits assignment (in conjunction with Register 0x72)

BitField.Name: reg015_b2_b0
BitField.Description: JESD204B CML differential output drive level adjustment

BitField.Name: reg018_b4_b0
reg019_b7_b0
BitField.Description: User Test Pattern 1 LSB; use in conjunction with Register 0x0D and Register 0x61

BitField.Name: reg021_b4_b3
BitField.Description: 00 = for lane speeds > 2 Gbps; 01 = for lane speeds < 2 Gbps

Option.Description: 1 = sync on next SYSREF+- rising edge only

BitField.Name: reg03A_b3
BitField.Description: 0 = normal mode; 1 = realign lanes on every active SYSREF+-

Option.Description: 1 = realign lanes on every active SYSREF+-

BitField.Name: reg03A_b4
BitField.Description: 0 = normal mode; 1 = realign lanes on every active SYNCINB+-

Option.Description: 1 = realign lanes on every active SYNCINB+-

BitField.Name: reg040_b5_b2
reg045_b2
BitField.Description: Force value of FDA/FDB pins if force pins is true, this value is output on FD pins

BitField.Name: reg05E_b7_b0
BitField.Description: Quick configuration register, always reads back 0x00

Option.Description: 0x11 = M = 1, L = 1; one converter, one lane; second converter is not automatically powered down
0x12 = M = 1, L = 2; one converter, two lanes; second converter is not automatically powered down
0x21 = M = 2, L = 1; two converters, one lane
0x22 = M = 2, L = 2; two converters, two lanes

BitField.Name: reg05F_b0
BitField.Description: Power- down JESD204B link; set high while configuring link parameters

BitField.Name: reg05F_b6
BitField.Description: Tail bits: If CSbits are not enabled

Option.Description: 1000 = modified RPAT test sequence, must be used with JTX_TEST_GEN_SEL = 01 (output of 8b/10b)

BitField.Name: reg06F_b7_b0
BitField.Description: JESD204B number of octets per frame (F); calculated value
BitField.Notes: (Note that this value is in x - 1 format]

BitField.Name: reg070_b7_b0
BitField.Description: JESD204B number of frames per multiframe (K); set value of K per JESD204B specifications, but also must be a multiple of 4 octets
BitField.Notes: (Note that this value is in x - 1 format]

BitField.Name: reg072_b3_b0
BitField.Notes: (Note that this value is in x - 1 format]

BitField.Name: reg073_b3_b0
BitField.Notes: (Note that this value is in x - 1 format]

BitField.Name: reg074_b4_b0
BitField.Description: JESD204B samples per converter frame cycle (S); read only
BitField.Notes: (Note that this value is in x - 1 format)

BitField.Name: reg075_b4_b0
BitField.Description: JESD204B control words per frame clock cycle per link (CF); read only

BitField.Name: reg082_b5_b4
BitField.Description: 00 = assign Logical Lane 0 to Physical Lane A [default]; 01 = assign Logical Lane 0 to Physical Lane B

Option.Description: 00 = assign Logical Lane 0 to Physical Lane A [default]
01 = assign Logical Lane 0 to Physical Lane B

BitField.Name: reg083_b1_b0
BitField.Description: 00 = assign Logical Lane 1 to Physical Lane A; 01 = assign Logical Lane 1 to Physical Lane B [default]

Option.Description: 00 = assign Logical Lane 1 to Physical Lane A
01 = assign Logical Lane 1 to Physical Lane B [default]

BitField.Name: reg08B_b4_b0
BitField.Description: Local multiframe clock (LMFC) phase offset value
BitField.Notes: Reset value for LMFC phase counter when SYSREF is asserted; used for deterministic delay applications

BitField.Name: reg0A8_b7_b0
BitField.Description: JESD204B pre-emphasis enable option (consult factory for more detail)
BitField.Notes: Set value to 0x04 for pre-emphasis off; Set value to 0x14 for pre-emphasis on

Option.Description: 0x04 = set value to 0x04 for pre-emphasis off
0x14 = set value to 0x14 for pre-emphasis on
